name: Fragment (faryalhussain)
description: Fragment is an experience in which memories are kept in sites of importance.Traces of our past reveal where we have gone. We only have so long before we pass, as our time here is temporary. Magical relics allow us to extend our time to absorb our memories. The experience is inspired by the transition between life and death; by taking you to an ethereal world where our memories are suspended in time. The transition speaks to how long we can dwell on these memories before they distort.
